verses.verse: And Abimelech<WH40> the son<WH1121> of Jerubbaal<WH3378> went<WH3212> to Shechem<WH7927> to his mother's<WH517> brothers,<WH251> and communed<WH1696> with them, and with all<WH3605> the family<WH4940> of the house<WH1004> of his mother's<WH517> father,<WH1> saying,<WH559>

Speak,<WH1696> I pray<WH4994> you, in the ears<WH241> of all<WH3605> the men<WH1167> of Shechem,<WH7927> Whether<WH4100> is better<WH2896> for you, either that all<WH3605> the sons<WH1121> of Jerubbaal,<WH3378> which are three score<WH7657> and ten persons,<WH376> reign<WH4910> over you, or that one<WH259> reign<WH4910> over you? remember<WH2142> also that I am your bone<WH6106> and your flesh.<WH1320>

And his mother's<WH517> brothers<WH251> spoke<WH1696> of him in the ears<WH241> of all<WH3605> the men<WH1167> of Shechem<WH7927> all<WH3605> these<WH428> words:<WH1697> and their hearts<WH3820> inclined<WH5186> to follow<WH935> <WH310> Abimelech;<WH40> for they said,<WH559> He is our brother.<WH251>

And they gave<WH5414> him three score<WH7657> and ten pieces of silver<WH3701> out of the house<WH1004> of Baalberith,<WH1170> with which Abimelech<WH40> hired<WH7936> vain<WH7386> and light<WH6348> persons,<WH582> which followed<WH3212> <WH310> him.

And he went<WH935> to his father's<WH1> house<WH1004> at Ophrah,<WH6084> and slew<WH2026> his brothers<WH251> the sons<WH1121> of Jerubbaal,<WH3378> being three score<WH7657> and ten persons,<WH376> on one<WH259> stone:<WH68> notwithstanding yet Jotham<WH3147> the youngest<WH3996> son<WH1121> of Jerubbaal<WH3378> was left;<WH3498> for he hid<WH2244> himself.

And all<WH3605> the men<WH1167> of Shechem<WH7927> gathered<WH622> together, and all<WH3605> the house<WH1004> of Millo,<WH4407> and went,<WH3212> and made Abimelech<WH40> king,<WH4428> by the plain<WH436> of the pillar<WH5324> that was in Shechem.<WH7927>

And when they told<WH5046> it to Jotham,<WH3147> he went<WH3212> and stood<WH5975> in the top<WH7218> of mount<WH2022> Gerizim,<WH1630> and lifted<WH5375> up his voice,<WH6963> and cried,<WH7121> and said<WH559> to them, Listen<WH8085> to me, you men<WH1167> of Shechem,<WH7927> that God<WH430> may listen<WH8085> to you.
The trees<WH6086> went<WH1980> forth on a time to anoint<WH4886> a king<WH4428> over<WH5921> them; and they said<WH559> to the olive<WH2132> tree, Reign<WH4427> you over<WH5921> us.

But the olive<WH2132> tree said<WH559> to them, Should I leave<WH2308> my fatness,<WH1880> with which<WH834> by me they honor<WH3513> God<WH430> and man,<WH376> and go<WH1980> to be promoted<WH5128> over<WH5921> the trees?<WH6086>
And the trees<WH6086> said<WH559> to the fig<WH8384> tree,<WH6086> Come<WH3212> you, and reign<WH4427> over<WH5921> us.

But the fig<WH8384> tree<WH6086> said<WH559> to them, Should I forsake<WH2308> my sweetness,<WH4987> and my good<WH2896> fruit,<WH8570> and go<WH1980> to be promoted<WH5128> over<WH5921> the trees?<WH6086>
Then said<WH559> the trees<WH6086> to the vine,<WH1612> Come<WH3212> you, and reign<WH4427> over<WH5921> us.
And the vine<WH1612> said<WH559> to them, Should I leave<WH2308> my wine,<WH8492> which cheers<WH8055> God<WH430> and man,<WH376> and go<WH1980> to be promoted<WH5128> over<WH5921> the trees?<WH6086>
Then said<WH559> all<WH3605> the trees<WH6086> to the bramble,<WH329> Come<WH3212> you, and reign<WH4427> over<WH5921> us.

And the bramble<WH329> said<WH559> to the trees,<WH6086> If<WH518> in truth<WH571> you anoint<WH4886> me king<WH4428> over<WH5921> you, then come<WH935> and put your trust<WH2620> in my shadow:<WH6738> and if<WH518> not, let fire<WH784> come<WH3318> out of the bramble,<WH329> and devour<WH398> the cedars<WH730> of Lebanon.<WH3844>

Now<WH6258> therefore, if<WH518> you have done<WH6213> truly<WH571> and sincerely,<WH8549> in that you have made Abimelech<WH40> king,<WH4427> and if<WH518> you have dealt<WH6213> well<WH2895> with Jerubbaal<WH3378> and his house,<WH1004> and have done<WH6213> to him according to the deserving<WH1576> of his hands;<WH3027>
(For my father<WH1> fought<WH3898> for you, and adventured<WH7993> his life<WH5315> far,<WH5048> and delivered<WH5337> you out of the hand<WH3027> of Midian:<WH4080>

And you are risen<WH6965> up against<WH5921> my father's<WH1> house<WH1004> this day,<WH3117> and have slain<WH2026> his sons,<WH1121> three score<WH7657> and ten persons,<WH376> on one<WH259> stone,<WH68> and have made Abimelech,<WH40> the son<WH1121> of his maidservant,<WH519> king<WH4427> over<WH5921> the men<WH1167> of Shechem,<WH7927> because<WH3588> he is your brother;<WH251>)

If<WH518> you then have dealt<WH6213> truly<WH571> and sincerely<WH8549> with Jerubbaal<WH3378> and with his house<WH1004> this<WH2088> day,<WH3117> then rejoice<WH8055> you in Abimelech,<WH40> and let him also<WH1571> rejoice<WH8055> in you:

But if<WH518> not, let fire<WH784> come<WH3318> out from Abimelech,<WH40> and devour<WH398> the men<WH1167> of Shechem,<WH7927> and the house<WH1004> of Millo;<WH4407> and let fire<WH784> come<WH3318> out from the men<WH1167> of Shechem,<WH7927> and from the house<WH1004> of Millo,<WH4407> and devour<WH398> Abimelech.<WH40>
And Jotham<WH3147> ran<WH5127> away, and fled,<WH1272> and went<WH3212> to Beer,<WH876> and dwelled<WH3427> there,<WH8033> for fear<WH6440> of Abimelech<WH40> his brother.<WH251>
When Abimelech<WH40> had reigned<WH7786> three<WH7969> years<WH8141> over<WH5921> Israel,<WH3478>

Then God<WH430> sent<WH7971> an evil<WH7451> spirit<WH7307> between<WH996> Abimelech<WH40> and the men<WH1167> of Shechem;<WH7927> and the men<WH1167> of Shechem<WH7927> dealt treacherously<WH898> with Abimelech:<WH40>

That the cruelty<WH2555> done to the three score<WH7657> and ten sons<WH1121> of Jerubbaal<WH3378> might come,<WH935> and their blood<WH1818> be laid<WH7760> on Abimelech<WH40> their brother,<WH251> which<WH834> slew<WH2026> them; and on the men<WH1167> of Shechem,<WH7927> which<WH834> aided<WH2388> <WH3027> him in the killing<WH2026> of his brothers.<WH251>

And the men<WH1167> of Shechem<WH7927> set<WH7760> liers in wait<WH693> for him in the top<WH7218> of the mountains,<WH2022> and they robbed<WH1497> all<WH3605> that came<WH5674> along that way<WH1870> by them: and it was told<WH5046> Abimelech.<WH40>

And Gaal<WH1603> the son<WH1121> of Ebed<WH5651> came<WH935> with his brothers,<WH251> and went<WH5674> over<WH5674> to Shechem:<WH7927> and the men<WH1167> of Shechem<WH7927> put their confidence<WH982> in him.

And they went<WH3318> out into the fields,<WH7704> and gathered<WH1219> their vineyards,<WH3754> and stepped<WH1869> the grapes, and made<WH6213> merry,<WH1974> and went<WH935> into the house<WH1004> of their god,<WH430> and did eat<WH398> and drink,<WH8354> and cursed<WH7043> Abimelech.<WH40>

And Gaal<WH1603> the son<WH1121> of Ebed<WH5651> said,<WH559> Who<WH4310> is Abimelech,<WH40> and who<WH4310> is Shechem,<WH7927> that we should serve<WH5647> him? is not he the son<WH1121> of Jerubbaal?<WH3378> and Zebul<WH2083> his officer?<WH6496> serve<WH5647> the men<WH582> of Hamor<WH2544> the father<WH1> of Shechem:<WH7927> for why<WH4100> should we serve<WH5647> him?

And would<WH4310> <WH5414> to God this<WH2088> people<WH5971> were under my hand!<WH3027> then would I remove<WH5493> Abimelech.<WH40> And he said<WH559> to Abimelech,<WH40> Increase<WH7235> your army,<WH6635> and come<WH3318> out.
And when Zebul<WH2083> the ruler<WH8269> of the city<WH5892> heard<WH8085> the words<WH1697> of Gaal<WH1603> the son<WH1121> of Ebed,<WH5651> his anger<WH639> was kindled.<WH2734>

And he sent<WH7971> messengers<WH4397> to Abimelech<WH40> privately,<WH8649> saying,<WH559> Behold,<WH2009> Gaal<WH1603> the son<WH1121> of Ebed<WH5651> and his brothers<WH251> be come<WH935> to Shechem;<WH7927> and, behold,<WH2009> they fortify<WH6696> the city<WH5892> against<WH5921> you.
Now<WH6258> therefore up by night,<WH3915> you and the people<WH5971> that is with you, and lie in wait<WH693> in the field:<WH7704>

And it shall be, that in the morning,<WH1242> as soon as the sun<WH8121> is up, you shall rise<WH7925> early,<WH7925> and set<WH6584> on the city:<WH5892> and, behold,<WH2009> when he and the people<WH5971> that is with him come<WH3318> out against<WH413> you, then may you do<WH6213> to them as you shall find<WH4672> occasion.<WH4672>

And Abimelech<WH40> rose<WH6965> up, and all<WH3605> the people<WH5971> that were with him, by night,<WH3915> and they laid wait<WH693> against<WH5921> Shechem<WH7927> in four<WH702> companies.<WH7218>

And Gaal<WH1603> the son<WH1121> of Ebed<WH5651> went<WH3318> out, and stood<WH5975> in the entering<WH6607> of the gate<WH8179> of the city:<WH5892> and Abimelech<WH40> rose<WH6965> up, and the people<WH5971> that were with him, from lying in wait.<WH3993>

And when Gaal<WH1603> saw<WH7200> the people,<WH5971> he said<WH559> to Zebul,<WH2083> Behold,<WH2009> there come<WH3381> people<WH5971> down<WH3381> from the top<WH7218> of the mountains.<WH2022> And Zebul<WH2083> said<WH559> to him, You see<WH7200> the shadow<WH6738> of the mountains<WH2022> as if they were men.<WH582>

And Gaal<WH1603> spoke<WH1696> again,<WH3254> <WH5750> and said,<WH559> See<WH2009> there come<WH3381> people<WH5971> down<WH3381> by the middle<WH2872> of the land,<WH776> and another<WH259> company<WH7218> come<WH935> along by the plain<WH436> of Meonenim.<WH6049>

Then said<WH559> Zebul<WH2083> to him, Where<WH346> is now<WH645> your mouth,<WH6310> with which<WH834> you said,<WH559> Who<WH4310> is Abimelech,<WH40> that we should serve<WH5647> him? is not this<WH2088> the people<WH5971> that you have despised?<WH3988> go<WH3318> out, I pray<WH4994> now,<WH6258> and fight<WH3898> with them.
And Gaal<WH1603> went<WH3318> out before<WH6440> the men<WH1167> of Shechem,<WH7927> and fought<WH3898> with Abimelech.<WH40>
And Abimelech<WH40> chased<WH7291> him, and he fled<WH5127> before<WH6440> him, and many<WH7227> were overthrown<WH5307> and wounded,<WH2491> even to the entering<WH6607> of the gate.<WH8179>
And Abimelech<WH40> dwelled<WH3427> at Arumah:<WH725> and Zebul<WH2083> thrust<WH1644> out Gaal<WH1603> and his brothers,<WH251> that they should not dwell<WH3427> in Shechem.<WH7927>
And it came<WH1961> to pass on the morrow,<WH4283> that the people<WH5971> went<WH3318> out into the field;<WH7704> and they told<WH5046> Abimelech.<WH40>

And he took<WH3947> the people,<WH5971> and divided<WH2673> them into three<WH7969> companies,<WH7218> and laid wait<WH693> in the field,<WH7704> and looked,<WH7200> and, behold,<WH2009> the people<WH5971> were come<WH3318> forth<WH3318> out of the city;<WH5892> and he rose<WH6965> up against<WH5921> them, and smote<WH5221> them.

And Abimelech,<WH40> and the company<WH7218> that was with him, rushed<WH6584> forward,<WH6584> and stood<WH5975> in the entering<WH6607> of the gate<WH8179> of the city:<WH5892> and the two<WH8147> other companies<WH7218> ran<WH6584> on all<WH3605> the people<WH5971> that were in the fields,<WH7704> and slew<WH5221> them.

And Abimelech<WH40> fought<WH3898> against the city<WH5892> all<WH3605> that day;<WH3117> and he took<WH3920> the city,<WH5892> and slew<WH2026> the people<WH5971> that was therein, and beat<WH5422> down<WH5422> the city,<WH5892> and sowed<WH2232> it with salt.<WH4417>
And when all<WH3605> the men<WH1167> of the tower<WH4026> of Shechem<WH7927> heard<WH8085> that, they entered<WH935> into<WH413> an hold<WH6877> of the house<WH1004> of the god<WH410> Berith.<WH1286>
And it was told<WH5046> Abimelech,<WH40> that all<WH3605> the men<WH1167> of the tower<WH4026> of Shechem<WH7927> were gathered<WH6908> together.

And Abimelech<WH40> got<WH5927> him up to mount<WH2022> Zalmon,<WH6756> he and all<WH3605> the people<WH5971> that were with him; and Abimelech<WH40> took<WH3947> an ax<WH7134> in his hand,<WH3027> and cut<WH3772> down a bough<WH7754> from the trees,<WH6086> and took<WH5375> it, and laid<WH7760> it on<WH5921> his shoulder,<WH7926> and said<WH559> to the people<WH5971> that were with him, What<WH4100> you have seen<WH7200> me do,<WH6213> make haste,<WH4116> and do<WH6213> as I have done.

And all<WH3605> the people<WH5971> likewise<WH1571> cut<WH3772> down every man<WH376> his bough,<WH7754> and followed<WH3212> <WH310> Abimelech,<WH40> and put<WH7760> them to the hold,<WH6877> and set the hold<WH6877> on fire<WH784> on them; so that all<WH3605> the men<WH582> of the tower<WH4026> of Shechem<WH7927> died<WH4191> also,<WH1571> about a thousand<WH505> men<WH376> and women.<WH802>
Then went<WH3212> Abimelech<WH40> to Thebez,<WH8405> and encamped<WH2583> against<WH413> Thebez,<WH8405> and took<WH3920> it.

But there was a strong<WH5797> tower<WH4026> within<WH8432> the city,<WH5892> and thither<WH8033> fled<WH5127> all<WH3605> the men<WH582> and women,<WH802> and all<WH3605> they of the city,<WH5892> and shut<WH5462> it to them, and got<WH5927> them up to the top<WH1406> of the tower.<WH4026>
And Abimelech<WH40> came<WH935> to the tower,<WH4026> and fought<WH3898> against it, and went<WH5066> hard<WH5066> to the door<WH6607> of the tower<WH4026> to burn<WH8313> it with fire.<WH784>
And a certain<WH259> woman<WH802> cast<WH7993> a piece<WH6400> of a millstone<WH7393> on Abimelech's<WH40> head,<WH7218> and all to broke<WH7533> his skull.<WH1538>

Then he called<WH7121> hastily<WH4120> to the young<WH5288> man his armor bearer,<WH5375> <WH3627> and said<WH559> to him, Draw<WH8025> your sword,<WH2719> and slay<WH4191> me, that men say<WH559> not of me, A woman<WH802> slew<WH2026> him. And his young<WH5288> man thrust<WH1856> him through, and he died.<WH4191>
And when the men<WH376> of Israel<WH3478> saw<WH7200> that Abimelech<WH40> was dead,<WH4191> they departed<WH3212> every man<WH376> to his place.<WH4725>
Thus God<WH430> rendered<WH7725> the wickedness<WH7451> of Abimelech,<WH40> which<WH834> he did<WH6213> to his father,<WH1> in slaying<WH2026> his seventy<WH7657> brothers:<WH251>

And all<WH3605> the evil<WH7451> of the men<WH582> of Shechem<WH7927> did God<WH430> render<WH7725> on their heads:<WH7218> and on them came<WH935> the curse<WH7045> of Jotham<WH3147> the son<WH1121> of Jerubbaal.<WH3378>
